Package it.polimi.se2019.controller

Class Observer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.controller.Observer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionController, Choice, DamagedController, EffectController, GameController, PaymentController, PaymentControllerTest.PaymentTest, Spawner, WeaponController
    public abstract class Observer
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic Controller - observer class used for receiving the updates from the RequestDispatcher
